skill.name: Full Stack Development
skill.description: Extensive experience in building end-to-end applications, proficient in both front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular) and back-end (Node.js, Python, Ruby on Rails) technologies.

skill.name: Database Management:
skill.description: Expertise in designing and optimizing databases, with proficiency in SQL and NoSQL databases (MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL).

skill.name: Server-side Development
skill.description: Proven ability to develop scalable and efficient server-side logic, utilizing frameworks such as Express.js and Django.

skill.name: API Integration
skill.description: Skilled in integrating third-party APIs and creating robust RESTful APIs for seamless communication between different components of a system.

skill.name: DevOps and Deployment
skill.description: Proficient in deploying applications using containerization (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes). Experience with continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

skill.name: Agile Methodologies
skill.description: In-depth understanding and application of Agile and Scrum methodologies to drive efficient and iterative development processes.

skill.name: Troubleshooting and Debugging
skill.description: Exceptional problem-solving skills, with a track record of identifying and resolving complex technical issues efficiently.

skill.name: UI/UX Design
skill.description: Well-versed in creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, with a focus on enhancing user experience.
